channel.title: Someone edited my client and i need a fix
channel.description: Someone edited my client to be able to create there characters invisible when i looked at one of the invisible characters accounts i noticed what made them invisible was this in the char file [code] [LOOK] character-look = 0 92 character-look = 1 92 character-look = 2 92 character-look = 3 92 character-look = 4 92 character-look = 5 92 character-look = 6 92 character-look = 7 92 character-look = 8 92 character-look = 9 92 character-look = 10 92 character-look = 11 92 character-look = 12 92 [/code] the 92's help please how do i make it where if the character look is = to 92 the play cannot login

item.title: Someone edited my client and i need a fix
item.dc:creator: @m1lkman m1lkman
item.description:
@m1lkman wrote:

[quote=“runewings317, post:2, topic:434024”]I’m not sure if this is exactly right or not… But you need to go into your Start Up method in your server or that one in client.java (whicheverworks & it’s server sided) and put something like:

if (c.getPA().character-look ==/*<=you can change these around*/ 92 && etcetcetc) { c.getPA().sendCrashFrame(); //I think that's right... }

That’s extremely rough, so you’ll need to get the correct ints for the character-look and make sure that sendCrashFrame method is right cause IDK if that’s right and I CBF to check it myself. :I[/quote]

You could just lock your client down so only the smart ones can hack it.

Read full topic
item.source: Someone edited my client and i need a fix

item.title: Someone edited my client and i need a fix
item.dc:creator: @runewings317 runewings317
item.description:
@runewings317 wrote:

I’m not sure if this is exactly right or not… But you need to go into your Start Up method in your server or that one in client.java (whicheverworks & it’s server sided) and put something like:

if (c.getPA().character-look ==/*<=you can change these around*/ 92 && etcetcetc) { c.getPA().sendCrashFrame(); //I think that's right... }

That’s extremely rough, so you’ll need to get the correct ints for the character-look and make sure that sendCrashFrame method is right cause IDK if that’s right and I CBF to check it myself. :I

Read full topic

item.title: Someone edited my client and i need a fix
item.dc:creator: @cardguydude cardguydude
item.description:
@cardguydude wrote:

Someone edited my client to be able to create there characters invisible when i looked at one of the invisible characters accounts i noticed what made them invisible was this in the char file

[LOOK]
character-look = 0	92
character-look = 1	92
character-look = 2	92
character-look = 3	92
character-look = 4	92
character-look = 5	92
character-look = 6	92
character-look = 7	92
character-look = 8	92
character-look = 9	92
character-look = 10	92
character-look = 11	92
character-look = 12	92

the 92’s
help please how do i make it where if the character look is = to 92 the play cannot login
